bibl.title: Heroes, Descendants of Hemitheoi: The Proemium of Theocritus 17 and Simonides 11 W2.

bibl.title: The New Simonides. Contexts of Praise and Desire

bibl.seg: FANTUZZI Marco, Heroes, Descendants of Hemitheoi: The Proemium of Theocritus 17 and Simonides 11 W2.
Deborah BOEDEKER and David SIDER (Edd.), The New Simonides. Contexts of Praise and Desire (Oxford, 2001) pp. 232-241.
An Italian version of this paper appeared as: Il proemio di Theocr. 17 e Simon. IEG2 fr. 11 W. Eroi, discendenti di semidei, Prometheus 24 (1998) pp. 97-110. - I.E.G. II2, Simonides, 11.
